text: The electric blues is a type of blues music made different by the amplification of the guitar, the bass guitar, and/or the harmonica. == Important electric blues artists == * John Lee Hooker * Eric Clapton * Fleetwood Mac * Rory Gallagher * Buddy Guy * Slim Harpo * Elmore James * B.B. King * Jimmy Reed * Eric Sardinas * Stevie Ray Vaughan * Muddy Waters * Bo Diddley * Howlin' Wolf * Jimi Hendrix * Jay Gordon * Led Zeppelin * Cream Category:Blues music
title: Electric blues
